name: easy crochet velvet twist headband
notes:
[direct pdf][1]

finished size 5 in x 19.5 in long 

bernat baby velvet
492yrds/450m (10.5oz/300g)
cuddly cloud (86018) or restful rose (86002) or bunny brown (86028) - 1 ball

size u.s. h/8 (5 mm) crochet hook

gauge: 16 hdc and 14 rows = 4" /10 cm in pattern

also available at [yarnspirations][2]


  [1]: https://daisyfarmcrafts.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/easy-velvet-twist-crochet-headbands-pdf.pdf
  [2]: https://www.yarnspirations.com/bernat-velvet-twist-crochet-headband/brc0101-030226m.html
